item.title: Fantech MAXFIT87 MK856 Blue Switch RGB Mechanical Keyboard
item.dc:creator: ITIOTECHADMINIFUBRUTEFORCEAGAINYOURBITCH
item.description:
• Blue Switch + TKL Factor + media keys
  • RGB Backlighting & Side Panel RGB
  • Detachable Type-C Cable
  • Full Keys Anti-Ghosting
item.content:encoded:
Specification

Main Features
Type Mechanical
Wired/Wireless Wired
Keys 87 Full Keys Anti-Ghosting (Double-injection, Keycap Puller)
Cable Length 1.6m PVC
Polling Rate 1000Hz
Switch Color Blue
Switch Lifecycle 50 Million Clicks
Others Illumination: RGB – 22 modes
Top Material: Metal
Keycaps: Double-injection
Core Construction: ABS Plastic
Physical Attribute
System Requirements Windows and Mac OS X. USB Port Required
Color Black
Dimensions 355 x 128 x 41mm
Weight 794gr without cable
Warranty Information
Warranty 01 year warranty

Description

Fantech MAXFIT87 MK856 Blue Switch RGB Mechanical Keyboard

Fantech MAXFIT87 MK856 RGB Mechanical Keyboard comes with Blue Switch, TKL Factor + media keys, RGB Backlighting & Side Panel RGB, Detachable Type-C Cable. This Keyboard will Truly lighten up your gaming with MAXFIT87’s side panel RGB and Illuminate your desk. This Mechanical keybord featured with Switch Lifetime: 50 million clicks, Total Keys: 87, Anti-ghosting: Full keys, 22 modes Illumination RGB, that enhance your gaming experience. MAXFIT87 Mechanical Keyboard features full featured keys at a streamlined size, perfect for anyone who wants to easily access any key or command on-the-fly while keeping their desk space. Including 4 additional media keys for even more accessibility. It is designed with Keycaps: Double-injection, Core Construction: ABS Plastic, Polling Rate: 1000Hz, Weight: 794gr without cable, To ensures that every single key you press registers simultaneously and accurately in-game.

Fantech MAXPOWER MK853 Red Switch RGB Mechanical Keyboard

Fantech MAXPOWER MK853 comes with 104 Total Keys; Switch Color: Red, RGB Gradient: 22 modes, Full Keys Anti-Ghosting, with 50 Million Keys Lifetime. This mechanical keyboard designed with the high and low key layout to adapt your hand. Makes you fee more comfortable when you work. This keyboard has Shortcut Volume Knob The cylindrical volume control knob lets you control the volume. This Mechanical Keyboard has 12 Multimedia keys and Anti-ghosting Full keys, which ensures that every single key you press registers simultaneously and accurately in-game. In this keyboard, Ergonomic Wrist Rest offers comfortable support ideal for long hours in the keyboard. The Latest Fantech MAXPOWER MK853 Mechanical Keyboard has 01 year warranty

Description

Fantech K612 Soldier RGB Gaming Keyboard

The exclusive Fantech keyboard is an ideal gaming keyboard which is comprised of 104 Full size RGB keys. It has the the ability to simultaneously press up to 19 keys with the help of Anti-Ghosting Technology. Besides, the keyboard has has double injection pump. The keyboard case is made of Metal Base. Chroma Illumination mode is available in this black colored device.

Description

Fantech HG11 Captain 7.1 Surround Sound Space Edition RGB USB Gaming Headphone White

Fantech HG11 Captain 7.1 Surround Sound Space Edition RGB USB Gaming Headphone White has a Mic size of 6.0*5MM and sensitivity of -40dB +/- 3 dB and Frequency of 50- 10KHz. The Mic is Omni Directional meaning that you can speak from any direction and it will be heard. The speaker has a 40MM dimension with an Impedance level of 32 Ohm at 1khz and a frequency level of 20-20KHZ. It also has a sensitivity level of 114+/-3dB at 1kh. The Plug that it has is USB with a cord length of 2M. This Gaming Headset has a 01-year warranty.

Cable Length 1.5 m
Interface USB 2.0
Physical Attribute
Color Black
Warranty Information
Warranty 1 Year

Havit GameNote KB500L Multi-Function LED Backlit USB Gaming Keyboard Black

The Havit KB500L keyboard is the best for the needs of both worlds, fully satisfying the needs for office and gaming use. They are impressive for use in games but they are also a simply elegant and beautiful keyboard for everyday use. When using for work, you can turn off the backlight, and when it’s time to turn on the game, turn on the light by simply pressing a button, turning it from a normal keyboard to a gaming keyboard.

item.title: Havit HV-MS1010 RGB Backlit Gaming Mouse
item.dc:creator: ITIOTECHADMINIFUBRUTEFORCEAGAINYOURBITCH

  • Number of keys: 7, Sensor: Optical
  • Four Gears of Speed
  • DPI Switching Function
item.content:encoded:
Main Features
Keys 7
Connection Type Wired
Optical Sensor Resolution 1200-1800-2400-3600
Cable Length 1.5m
Gaming Features
Color Option Backlight RGB
Physical Specifications
Color Black
Dimension(LxWxH) 125mm x 63.5mm x 40mm
Warranty Information
Warranty 01 year warranty

Description

Havit HV-MS1010 RGB Backlit Gaming Mouse

Havit HV-MS1010 RGB Backlit Gaming Mouse is suitable for both gaming and operating modes. This new gaming mouse is featured with DPI Switching Function. You can adjust the cursor resolution according to your needs in one click, DPI toggle button. This new Havit Gaming Mouse featured with Materials Plastic, Power 5W, Number of keys 7, Cable length 1.5m, Interface USB, DPI 1200-1800-2400-3600, Voltage 5V, Click resource 3000000, Sensor Optical andOverall dimensions 125mm x 63.5mm x 40mm. The advantages of this gaming mouse is 7 control buttons, 4 presetting the resolution of the optical sensor to select the, optimal mode (in DPI): 1200-1800-2400-3600, Improved ergonomics and game design and RGB backlight around the perimeter of the mouse. Here, the RGB backlight function allows you to adjust the shade. The new Havit HV-MS1010 RGB Backlit Gaming Mouse comes with 01 year warranty.

Havit HV-MS1027 USB Gaming Mouse

Havit HV-MS1027 USB Gaming Mouse comes with One click to switch the DPI, Four gears of mouse adjustment(800-1200-1600-2400DPI) and Cool breathing light design. This gaming mouse featured with forward/ backward function, Ergonomic design, with anti-slipping surface, that fits perfectly to palms and without fatigue in long-time using. The mouse has a predatory, gaming design, that creates a unique atmosphere that will increase the pleasure of playing and at the same time. This new Havit HV-MS1027 USB Gaming Mouse has 01 year warranty.

Havit MS1008 RGB Backlit Optical Gaming Mouse

Havit MS1008 RGB Backlit Gaming Mouse comes with 800-1200-2400-3200DPI Resolution, that enables freely switching in game. It’s designe with Ergonomic Style & Size with 115.2 x 63 x 37.6mm Dimensions. Here,Chip: NST5311, Voltage: 5V, Key life: 3,000,000 times features are also available. This new Havit MS1008 RGB Backlit Optical Gaming Mouse has 01 year warranty.

item.title: Havit Gamenote H2019U Headphone
item.dc:creator: ITIOTECHADMINIFUBRUTEFORCEAGAINYOURBITCH

  • Awesome 7.1 Surround Sound
item.content:encoded:
Physical Specification
Dimensions 189.6 x 202.5 x 37.2mm
Color Black
Cable Length 2.2m
Technical Specification
Frequency Range 20hz to 20k hz
Impedance 32 ±10%Ω
Sensitivity 118dB±3dB
Input Jack 7.1 USB plug
Driver Diameter Φ50mm
Connectivity Wired
Others Operating Current: ≤ 20mA
Warranty Information
Manufacturing Warranty 1-year Warranty
Microphone
Microphone Size Φ4.0 x 2.7mm

Havit H2019U Game Note USB 7.1 Surround Sound RGB Gaming Headphone Black

The Havit H2019U Game Note USB 7.1 Surround Sound RGB Gaming Headphone Black has a Super 50MM large unit speaker that provides you with 3D surround stereo sound. The Lightweight design makes it very portable and the retractable head beam allows you to set the headphone to your specific need for more comfort and freedom. The cool RGB streamer lighting effect gives you a better feel of your surrounding and allows you to enjoy it while gaming. It has all-inclusive skin earmuffs to provide you with the utmost comfort, the passive noise reduction provides you with better sound experience without having any distraction, and the high sensitivity omnidirectional microphone gives you the freedom of talking in any direction. You do not need to speak into the mic in a specific direction. It is able to take in sound from any direction easily.
